title: Requests are accepted when the provided filtering parameters are valid
description:
* `filter_by_property` and `filter_value` are both provided
* `filter_by_property` is a property that is actually specified for the node type (incl. ID, created\_at and updated\_at)
* optional `filter_operator` is `eq`, `neq`, `lt`, `gt`, `lte`, `gte` or empty
